contents.sentence:
Was coring in accordance with the following:
(a) The Contractor shall obtain cores in the presence of the Engineer with a device that shall produce a uniform 6 ±0.25 in. diameter pavement sample.
(b) Coring shall be completed prior to the random location being covered by the next course.
(c) All core locations will be marked and shall be cored within two workdays of placement.
(d) The Contractor and the Engineer shall mark the core to define the course to be tested.
To obtain a core that adequately reflects the density of the pavement.
a. Measure and check the diameter of the obtained core if it is 6 ±0.25 in.
b. Check if the coring is completed before the random location is covered by the next course.
c. Check if all core locations are marked and cored within two workdays of placement.
d. Verify if Contractor personnel marked the course for which the density is to be determined on the core.
